pullrequest.title: Fix compiler error due to specified double type instead of btScalar in BulletUniversalJoint.cc on Apple LLVM version 5.1 (clang-503.0.38) (based on LLVM 3.4svn)

content.raw: There is an error here, but I think they should be defined as btScalar instead of double or float. The btScalar type is determine by the configuration of your bullet build. In the gazebo homebrew formula, we recommend using the [double precision option](https://github.com/osrf/homebrew-simulation/blob/master/gazebo.rb#L24) but it is not required.
content.html: There is an error here, but I think they should be defined as btScalar instead of double or float. The btScalar type is determine by the configuration of your bullet build. In the gazebo homebrew formula, we recommend using the double precision option but it is not required.
